pageProduct.name: Avene DermAbsolu Day Cream 40ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avene DermAbsolu Defining Day Cream helps the skin to visibly combat the signs of ageing thanks to the unique combination of active ingredients:
- Vanilla Polyphenols: Hyaluronic Acid protectors, visibly give back substance and firm the skin, antioxidant
- SytenolTM: helps protect against collagen depletion, visibly lifts, tones and reshapes the contours of the face
- Glycoleol: Essential skin lipid precursor, intensely nourishes the skin
This combination guarantees unprecedented benefits; visibly lifting, firming and restoring comfort to the skin.

The formula also contains two intensely moisturising and nourishing phases as well as coating and filling agents for a plumping effect. A “white light” pigment combined with two natural glow pigments (violet-copper) gently illuminate the face without causing excessive shine. The creamy texture leaves an ultra-comfortable film on the skin resulting in a brighter appearance. Skin is visibly firmer, lifted and appearance of deep wrinkles are reduced.

PROVEN EFFICACY to improve skin firmness by 91% after 4 weeks, and 93% after 8 weeks*

PROVEN EFFICACY to visibly combat the signs of ageing by 85% after 4 weeks, and 92% after 8 weeks*

PROVEN EFFICACY long-lasting lifting effect by 87% after 4 weeks, and 89% after 8 weeks*
*% of satisfaction – Consumer in use test after 1 and 2 months, applied once daily on 84 subjects
**Measurement of the Hydration Index on 22 subjects with dehydrated skin, after 1 application on the forearm

Common Uses

Helps the skin to visibly combat the signs of ageing

Ingredients

  • Avene Thermal Spring Water: Soothing and anti-irritating
  • Vanilla Polyphenols: Hyaluronic Acid protectors, visibly give back substance and firm the skin, antioxidant
  • SytenolTM: helps protect against collagen depletion, visibly lifts, tones and reshapes the contours of the face 
  • Glycoleol: Essential skin lipid precursor, intensely nourishes the skin

Directions

Innovative and secure packaging: the airless jar. The new packaging offers absolute simplicity of use: simply turn the jar one-quarter of a turn into the “on” position and press to deliver the dose.
Apply in the morning to the face, neck and décolleté.
